div.p: MEMBERSHIP, YOU WILL GET "KILLING JESUS" FREE OF CHARGE.
DAY. WITH ALL OF THE HIGH-TECH GEAR
EVERYWHERE, SOME OF US HAVE LOST IT.
SEE IF YOU CAN GO ONE FULL DAY WITHOUT GIZMOS.
NO TEXTING, CELL PHONE, COMPUTER GAMES, OR ENTERTAINMENT.
SEE HOW HARD THAT IS FOR YOU. THAT WILL TELL YOU THE LEVEL OF
YOUR PSYCHOLOGICAL DEPENDENCE ON MACHINES, AN IMPORTANT THING TO
KNOW. LET ME KNOW BY E-MAIL AFTER THE
EXPERIMENT. NOT THAT DAY, SINCE YOU CAN'T
USE E-MAIL. "FACTOR TIP OF THE DAY."
WE HAVE TO CONTROL THE MACHINES, DON'T LET THE MACHINES CONTROL
YOU. THAT IS IT FOR TONIGHT.
CHECK OUT THE FACTOR WEBSITE. DIFFERENT THAN BILLOREILLY.COM.
